about_the_game:
Take your pixel art game to the next level with these animations! Nearly 100 animation effects are drawn in crisp and clear pixel-art that will work with retro styles. Weapon attacks from sword slashes to piercing arrows; elemental spells from fireballs to columns of water to lightning storms; subtle effects of dust and smoke to bring life to the world environment; and even and status effects for poison, blind, sleep, and more-- this collection of animations includes everything you need to make your game come alive!

Features:

- Each animation sheet has multiple animations-- over 90 animations in total!
- Multiple weapon animations: swords, arrows, axes, clubs, claws, and more
- A variety of elemental magics: fire, wind, water, earth and more
- Includes animations for status effects like sleep, blind, paralysis, and others
- Combine frames to create custom unique animations in RPG Maker!
- Retro pixel art -- fits multiple styles, including Omega Modern and Time Fantasy!
- For use with RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

short_description: This collection of animations is full of retro charm! With a clean oldschool style, these animations will find a home in any pixel art project. Includes animations for sword slashes, weapon impacts, smoke and dust effects, all sorts of elemental magical spells, and more!
